  *[[tipidoc:TipiEcho:types:color|color]] : background (writable) 
  *[[tipidoc:TipiEcho:types:color|color]] : foreground (writable) 
  *[[tipidoc:TipiEcho:types:border|border]] : border (writable) 
  *[[tipidoc:Tipi:types:string|string]] : text (writable) 
  *[[tipidoc:Tipi:types:integer|integer]] : defaultSize (writable) 
  *[[tipidoc:Tipi:types:string|string]] : tooltiptext (writable) 
  *[[tipidoc:Tipi:types:url|url]] : icon (writable) 
  *[[tipidoc:Tipi:types:boolean|boolean]] : showSpring (writable)
